bibl.title: Letter Writing, Materiality, and Gifts in Late Antiquity: Some Perspectives on Material Culture.
bibl.note: Letters, which had their own materiality, were not only about the transmission of a message: some tentative conclusions can be drawn about the material and social environments of correspondence accompanying a gift. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Joe Williams, Letter Writing, Materiality, and Gifts in Late Antiquity: Some Perspectives on Material Culture.
Noel Lenski (ed.), Letters in Late Antiquity = Journal of Late Antiquity 7 (2014) pp. 351-359.

Letters, which had their own materiality, were not only about the transmission of a message: some tentative conclusions can be drawn about the material and social environments of correspondence accompanying a gift. - Avec résumé en anglais.
